The protagonist of the 2013 film \"Under.Action: Becomes intrigued by human emotions and grows empathy over time
Efficiently lures and preys on humans to collect resources
Goes off mission due to developing empathy, indicating tolerance and internal moral conflict

Moves purposefully through a crowd, drawing attention without interaction or acknowledgement of others.
Selects cosmetics and beauty products seemingly out of curiosity or experimentation, but no warmth is conveyed through these behaviors.

Maintains calm and control when the man makes inappropriate advances, admonishing him clearly and taking charge of the situation.

Shows little emotional expression or attachment, appearing detached and mechanical.
Follows the swimmer's gaze and attention when the woman is in danger but does not intervene or express concern.
